p: When analyzing the images of the samples taken by the scanning electron microscope (SEM), Figure 1 shows the following: On the lithium disilicate (IPS e.max CAD) surface, chips may be seen as a result of milling of the discs and irregularities typical of ceramic sintering. The surface of VITA CAD-Temp, on the other hand, is a more homogeneous surface where concentric grooves may be observed, resulting from the machining of the piece by the manufacturer.
